definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
table/desk/classifier for tables of guests at a banquet etc
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Here you can set a delay for switching desktops using the active borders feature.
sentences.chinese: 這裏您可以設置用活動桌面邊界切換桌面的延時。

sentences.english: Conceptually, these remind us of the old Active Desktop.
sentences.chinese: 從概念上來說，這些會讓我們想起舊的活動桌面。
